span.style: border: 1px solid rgb(129, 129, 81); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 225); font-size: x-small; white-space: nowrap; padding:0px 2px;

dl.dd: If true, the best match value will be filled into the textbox as the user types. If set to false or omitted, the value must be selected from the list.
